body.p: To his excellency Thomas E. Bramlett Governor of the Commonwealth of the Commonwealth of Ky,

Your Petitioner Mary Sally Percifull Respectfully shoeth unto your Excellency that she is a widow 66 years of age and that she has but one son, he was a Captain in the Rebel army and he was captured & sent to camp Chase but by the intercession and upon the petition of his loyal neighbours he was released by his taking the amnesty oath of the president of the united states, he came home by the clemancy of the president of the united states & faithfully Kept his oath and pledge to the letter but he was indicted by the Knox Circuit Court for treason against the state of Kentucky and he has been compelled to leave his home again because he he is poor and not able in means to bear the expence of a trial the Captain in whose behalf this petition is made is Thomas J. Percifull he has shed the blood of no man is just & honorable to all men & ^he is truly^ esteemed by his
acquaintances My child has erred but be mercifull to the widow and orphaned may the Lord Showen upon you and yours the blessing promised to those who visit the father & widows in their affliction,
we the undersignd believe the statements of the foregoing petion are true & pray to be heard in behalf of the petitioner
